> <OLD>
>
> Tucson narrows his optics to concentrate on the source of the disturbance he
> had first detected.  There were thermal readings that were fluxuating that
> indicated movement.  He frowns at the thought of having to be ambushed.  A
> low growl escapes his throat, and clenched fang like teeth become apparent
> on his face.  He was ready to fight if need be.
>
> " Careful, not too fast, everyone.  There is definitely movement of the
> sentient kind."

<NEW>

The climb down continued, down past more levels of cells and room,
most of which could not be scanned properly due to the armor plating
between them and the room itself. The trio must have traversed 10
levels or more before finally coming to a stop over a grating at the
bottom which opened out into a hallway.

NIGHT VIPER was the first one at the bottom and he took a moment to
look. Carefully he looked through the greating first and then with a
careful movement he pulled it back, the movement surprisingly quiet.

and then . . .

"It took you long enough!" came a fierce whisper from the hallway, it
was BREAK's voice.

"Quiet!" LONGRACK said as he stepped out of the shadows as well, his
voice very quiet as he spoke. "Its good you guys got here, I was
begining to worry about you."

Behind LONGRACK and BREAK three more individuals stepped out, it was
STAMPY and MACH KICK and SHARP EDGE.

NIGHT VIPER leaped to the floor, twisting in mid-air and landing
agilly and soundlessly. "We had to wait for tall and scaly over 'ere
to make up his mind if he was comin' or not." He hooked a thumb at
TUSCON.

LONG RACK looked up, "Ahh I see. He's with us then."

NIGHT VIPER nodded. "Big's behind him."

(TAG)

Preston
